SQL.LOAD: SELECT service_center_id, contact_info_id, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, effective, expiration, vendor_contact_id FROM elp_vendor_contact WHERE vendor_contact_id = :vendor_contact_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select vc.service_center_id, vc.contact_info_id, vc.effective, vc.expiration, vc.vendor_contact_id, cf.CONTACT_INFO_ID, cf.ADDRESS_TYPE_ID, cf.ADDRESS_ID, cf.SALUTATION_ID , cf.NAME, cf.HOME_PHONE, cf.WORK_PHONE, cf.EMAIL, cf.CELL_PHONE, cf.COMPANY, cf.JOB_TITLE, vc.CREATED_BY, vc.MODIFIED_BY, vc.CREATED_DATE, vc.MODIFIED_DATE from elp_contact_info cf join elp_vendor_contact vc on vc.contact_info_id = cf.contact_info_id where vc.service_center_id = :service_center_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_vendor_contact SET service_center_id = :service_center_id, contact_info_id = :contact_info_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE vendor_contact_id = :vendor_contact_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_vendor_contact ( service_center_id, contact_info_id, effective, expiration, created_by, vendor_contact_id ) VALUES ( :service_center_id, :contact_info_id, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :vendor_contact_id )
SQL.LOAD_CONTACT_INFO_LIST: Select vc.VENDOR_CONTACT_ID, vc.SERVICE_CENTER_ID, ci.CONTACT_INFO_ID, ci.ADDRESS_TYPE_ID, ci.ADDRESS_ID, ci.SALUTATION_ID, ci.NAME, ci.HOME_PHONE, ci.WORK_PHONE, ci.CELL_PHONE, ci.EMAIL, ci.JOB_TITLE, ci.COMPANY, vc.CREATED_BY, vc.MODIFIED_BY, vc.CREATED_DATE, vc.MODIFIED_DATE, ci.CREATED_BY, ci.MODIFIED_BY, ci.CREATED_DATE, ci.MODIFIED_DATE from elp_contact_info ci join elp_vendor_contact vc on vc.contact_info_id = ci.contact_info_id where vc.contact_info_id = :contact_info_id
